Taylor Swift and Blake Lively Confirmed to End Their Friendship?

Taylor Swift and Blake Lively, once celebrated for their close-knit friendship, are now experiencing a very public and painful rift.

After nearly a decade of shared vacations, red-carpet appearances, and even family milestones, the two stars have reportedly gone silent following a series of legal and personal dramas in 2025. 

What happened between these celebrities?

Legal Drama?

The turning point came when Blake Lively became embroiled in a lawsuit against her It Ends With Us co-star and director Justin Baldoni, alleging sexual harassment.

The situation escalated when Baldoni’s legal team subpoenaed Taylor Swift, claiming Lively had tried to use her superstar friend to influence aspects of the film’s production.

Swift’s representatives firmly denied any involvement, stating she had no creative input and only permitted one of her songs to be used in the film. 

Further controversy erupted when Baldoni’s lawyers accused Lively of asking Swift to delete their text messages—an allegation Lively’s attorney called “categorically false.”

Though a judge later struck this claim from the record, the damage to the friendship was done. 

Emotional Distance Between Them

Multiple sources confirm that Swift and Lively have not spoken since the legal drama unfolded.

“There’s been radio silence between Taylor and Blake since the subpoena was dropped,” one insider told Us Weekly, adding that the friendship has “stalled” and that “they won’t pick up where they left off because of all the emotional residue”.

Swift, for her part, is said to feel “relief” now that her involvement in the case is over and is focusing on her music and personal life. 

While some reports suggest that the friendship is “fractured” but not entirely over, others are more definitive, saying the bond is “done” and that Lively is “heartbroken” after Swift cut ties.

What's Next?

According to PEOPLE, the two are making efforts to get back “on good terms,” but their relationship “isn’t the same as it was before,” and they “aren’t as close and haven’t been spending as much time together as they did in the past”. 

For now, both stars appear to be moving forward separately.

Swift, supported by her partner Travis Kelce and her inner circle, is reportedly focused on her upcoming album and tour, while Lively is navigating her ongoing legal battles.

Whether the two will eventually reconcile remains uncertain, but for now, one of Hollywood’s most famous friendships remains on ice.

Let's share these Marvel jokes with friends and family to spread the laughter. Until next time, keep laughing and stay marvelous! (Photo by Komar.de)

55 Marvel Jokes That Will Leave You in Stitches

Marvel fans know that their epic battles and dramatic storylines don't just define their heroes and villains. All characters also bring their ability to make us smile.


This list of Marvel jokes Will Make Every Fan Laugh. Whether you're swinging through the skies with Spider-Man or plotting world dominance with Thanos, humor is around the corner. Here are 55 Marvel jokes that will leave you in laughing. It is perfect for sharing with friends or brightening your day!

1. Why did Spider-Man break up with his girlfriend? - Because she found him too clingy!

2. What’s Thor’s favorite part of the joke? - The punchline!

3. Why don’t the Avengers use the elevator? - Because they prefer to take the stairs to avoid a Thor-ough work out!

4. How does Iron Man like his toast? - With a little bit of "Jarvis" on top!

5. What did Captain America say to the Hulk when he broke his phone? - “You really should watch your smashing!”


6. What is Dr. Strange’s cousin’s name who cannot do magic? Doctor Normal.

7. What do you call it when Loki tells a lie? - A "Loki-tale!"

8. Why did Hawkeye get kicked out of the bar? - Because he kept hitting on all the targets!

Marvel Jokes

9. How does Groot respond to bad jokes? - “I am Groot…ly unimpressed!”


10. Why is Deadpool always so calm? - Because he knows how to keep his cool under "Dead-pool" pressure!

11. What did Nick Fury say to the confused superhero? - “I’m not a magician, but I can make your problems disappear!”

12. Why did Captain Marvel bring a ladder to the bar? - Because she heard the drinks were on the house!

13. What’s Ant-Man’s favorite type of music? - Anything that’s small

14. Why did the Scarlet Witch break up with her boyfriend? - Because he couldn’t handle her “hex”-pectations!

15. What’s Thanos’ favorite game? - "Hide and Seek," but he always wins because he has the Infinity Stones!

16. How does Spider-Man keep his suit clean? - With "web" detergent!

17. Why does Doctor Strange never get lost ? - Because he always uses his "Eye of Agamotto" to find the right path!

18. What do you call a superhero who can’t stop telling jokes? - A “pun-isher!”

19. Why doesn’t the Hulk ever lose at poker? - Because he always knows when to hold ‘em and when to smash ‘em!

20. How does Black Panther like his coffee ? - With a little bit of "Wakanda" cream!

21. Why did Vision get a job at the bakery? - Because he’s great at making "dough" rise!


22. What does Captain America do when he gets frustrated? - He takes a "shield" break!

23. Why is Spider-Man such a bad secret agent? - Because he always leaves his "web " behind!

24. What did Iron Man say when he finally won a race? - “I am the fastest Avenger, and that's no Tony Stark!”

25. Why does Thor always carry a hammer? - Because it really "hits" home!

26. What’s Black Widow’s favorite exercise? - The "Widow" squat!

27. Why did the Hulk refuse to play hide and seek? - Because he didn’t want to lose his temper and smash the place up!

28. How does Doctor Strange stay in shape? - He practices "kettle-bells" of magic!

29. What’s Spider-Man’s favorite type of exercise? - Web-slinging, obviously!


30. Why did Loki bring an extra pair of socks? - In case he got a hole in one!

31. Why did Captain America bring a pencil to the fight? - In case he needed to draw his shield!

32. What did Thor say when he lost his hammer? - “I can’t believe I’ve been de-thor-oughly defeated!”

Marvel Jokes

33. How does Hawkeye stay so fit? - He always takes aim at his fitness goals!


34. Why is Iron Man such a good musician? - Because he always hits the right notes with his suit’s “Iron” tone!

35. What did Black Widow say at the comedy club? - “I’m here to kill… with laughter!”

36. Why does Captain America make a great chef? - He always knows how to serve up justice… and a mean burger!

37. What do you call it when Thor forgets his hammer? - A "Thor-ible" situation!

38. What’s the Avengers’ favorite day of the week? Thorsday.

39. What’s Iron Man’s favorite part of a newspaper? - The “Iron”y section!

40. Why does Captain Marvel never get lost in space? - Because she always follows her GPS – Galactic Positioning System!

41. What did Hulk say when he saw a beautiful sunset? - “HULK LOVE NATURE, BUT THIS IS TOO PRETTY TO SMASH!”

42. Why does Thor only use his hammer for work? - Because “Mjölnir” is really bad at holding down a nine-to-five job!

43. What’s Loki’s favorite game to play? - "Trick or Treat," because he’s always in for a surprise!

44. Why did Black Panther join a meditation class? - To learn how to stay "Wakanda" calm under pressure!

45. What did Spider-Man say to his partner during a workout? - “Let’s stick together and crush those fitness goals!”


46. Why doesn't Iron Man ever get lost on the way to a party? - Because he always has the best “Arc” reactor for navigation!

47. What did Captain America say when he was asked about his favorite drink? - “I prefer ‘Cap’pucino – it gives me that extra boost!”

48. Why did Vision refuse to play cards? - Because he couldn’t handle being called “decked” out!

Marvel Jokes

49. What is the favorite song of Hulk? “It’s Not Easy Being Green.”

50. What does Ant-Man use to keep his house organized? - Tiny “Ant”iques!

51. Why did the Scarlet Witch go to therapy? - She needed help with her “hex” issues!

52. How does Groot like his music? - With many “root” notes!


53. What is Thanos's favorite dessert? - A "snap" of cheesecake!

54. What would you get if you crossed Captain America with Hulk? The Star-Spangled Banner.

55. What’s Spider-Man’s favorite part of a joke? - The punchline, of course!

We hope these Marvel jokes brought a smile to your face and made your day a little brighter. Are you a die-hard fan or need to enjoy a good laugh? These Marvel jokes are sure to keep you entertained.

Remember, a good joke can be as powerful as any superhero.

Let's share these Marvel jokes with friends and family to spread the laughter. Until next time, keep laughing and stay marvelous!

5 Creepy Places in Rajasthan That Will Haunt Your Dream

5 Creepy Places in Rajasthan That Will Haunt Your Dream

Rajasthan is a land of majestic forts and a vibrant culture. Rajasthan hides some of the creepiest and most haunted places in its historical tapestry.

Step into the shadows of history as we explore "5 Creepy Places in Rajasthan That Will Haunt Your Dreams," where the echoes of the past still send shivers down your spine.

Creepy Places in Rajasthan

1. Rana Kumbha Palace

Location: Chittorgarh Fort Village, Chittorgarh, Rajasthan

In the heart of Chittorgarh, the Rana Kumbha Palace is a testament to haunting tales of sacrifice and betrayal.

Legend says that Rani Padmini and 700 women performed Jauhar (self-immolation to protect honor) within these walls, cursing the fort.

Creepy Places in Rajasthan

Locals speak of sightings, creepy noises, and cries echoing through time. Sultan Khilji's brutal attack and the next tragedy have left a chilling mark on this legendary palace.

Location: Gola ka baas, Rajgarh Tehsil, Alwar, Bhangarh, Rajasthan

At the top of the list of haunted places in Rajasthan is the infamous Bhangarh Fort. Said to be the most haunted site in India by the Archaeological Survey of India (ASI), Bhangarh Fort is forbidden after dark.

2. Bhangarh Fort

The scare story involves the beautiful Queen Ratnawati and a lovestruck tantric. Shadows, screams, and the echoes of a cursed past linger. Some visitors report ghostly sightings and the sinister whispers of a bygone era.

3. Jagatpura

Location: Region near Jaipur Airport, Jaipur, Rajasthan

Jagatpura lies in the bustling city of Jaipur. Jagatpura is a place shrouded in spooky tales dating back to the rule of a greedy and evil king. Cursed by the starving masses, this region is haunted by figures seeking help. Amidst the beauty of the capital city, Jagatpura hides a dark secret. It is where the echoes of the past echo through the present.

Location: Amer Rd, Jal Mahal, Amer, Jaipur, Rajasthan

Once a regal tour spot, Jal Mahal, now deteriorating, stands in the middle of Man Sagar Lake.

4. Jal Mahal

Locals believe that supernatural energy is causing the palace's decline. Ghostly figures are said to roam the area, leading to restrictions on visiting due to safety concerns. The underwater ruins see a palace haunted by neglect and perhaps something more ghostly.

flickr/gofootloose/Tomas Belcik

5. Kuldhara Village

Location: 17 km west of Jaisalmer city

A ghost town frozen in time, Kuldhara Village near Jaisalmer carries a chilling legacy. Once home to successful Paliwal Brahmins, the village was abandoned in the early 19th century.

The curse is said to originate from the refusal of the sarpanch's daughter to marry the district minister. Tales of an elite village turned lonely echo through the silent streets, where abandonment and curses twist.

As you travel through the landscapes of Rajasthan, remember that every fort, palace, and village has a story to tell. 

These haunted places in Rajasthan are filled with the weight of their creepy histories. These destinations invite you to venture into the unknown, where the past and present hit in spectral harmony.

Creepy Places in Rajasthan

Dylan Harper: Profile of a Young Basketball Star Ready to Shine in the NBA

Dylan Harper, a basketball player born on March 2, 2006, is currently a hot topic in the American basketball world.

After showing brilliant performance at Rutgers Scarlet Knights, Harper has now officially joined the San Antonio Spurs in the NBA.

Before stepping into the professional world, Harper had already stolen attention since he was at Don Bosco Preparatory High School.

In his junior season, he scored an average of 24.9 points, 6 rebounds, 3 assists, and 2 steals per game.

At its peak, he managed to bring his team to win the NJSIAA Non-Public A state championship title in his senior season.

No wonder, he became one of the most sought-after five-star recruits.

Shining at Rutgers University Like His Big Brother

Once the number one recruit by ESPN, Harper finally decided to join Rutgers University, the same choice of his older brother, Ron Harper Jr.

This decision made him the highest-ranked recruit in the history of the Rutgers program.

At Rutgers, Harper immediately showed his class.

He won various prestigious awards, including Honorable Mention AP All-American and Third Team All-Big Ten.

His statistical record was also impressive, with an average of 19.4 points, 4.6 rebounds, and 4.0 assists per game.

Selected by San Antonio Spurs and Support of Basketball Family

Dylan Harper reacts to becoming the highest pick in @RutgersMBB history:

"Definitely exciting." pic.twitter.com/fHZq8LJPg5

— NBA (@NBA) June 26, 2025

In the 2025 NBA Draft, Dylan Harper's name was finally called.

The San Antonio Spurs chose him as the second pick.

A big step for Harper to realize his dream on the highest basketball stage.

Harper was born into a family that loves basketball.

His older brother, Ron Harper Jr., is also a former Rutgers player. His mother, Maria Harper, is an assistant coach at Don Bosco Prep.

Most proudly, his father, Ron Harper, is an NBA legend with a 15-year career and five championship titles!

In addition to the achievements above, Harper has also won various other prestigious awards, such as McDonald's All-American MVP, Morgan Wooton McDonald's National High School Player of the Year, and Gatorade High School Player of the Year in New Jersey.

A proof that Harper is a talented and dedicated young player.

With a lot of potential and family support, Dylan Harper is ready to shine in the NBA.

Let's just wait for his action on the field!

70 Inspiring Teamwork Quotes to Motivate Your Team

Working together is key to success in any organization. These 70 teamwork quotes will inspire your team to collaborate better and achieve great things:

The Power of Unity

1. Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

2. Teamwork makes the dream work.

3. Many hands make light work.

4. United we stand, divided we fall.

5. The strength of the team is each member. The strength of each member is the team.

6. Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.

7. Talent wins games, but teamwork wins championships.

8. Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.

9. None of us is as smart as all of us.

10. Great things in business are never done by one person. They’re done by a team of people.

Building Trust and Relationships

11. Trust is the glue of life. It’s the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It’s the foundational principle that holds all relationships.

12. The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.

13. Respect your fellow human being, treat them fairly, disagree with them honestly, enjoy their friendship, explore your thoughts about one another candidly, work together for a common goal and help one another achieve it.

14. It’s better to have a great team than a team of greats.

15. Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you, spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.

Overcoming Challenges Together

16. Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision.

17. Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

18. The nice thing about teamwork is that you always have others on your side.

19. Teamwork begins by building trust. And the only way to do that is to overcome our need for invulnerability.

20. It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.

Fostering Collaboration

21. If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

22. Collaboration allows us to know more than we are capable of knowing by ourselves.

23. The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.

24. Teamwork is the secret that makes common people achieve uncommon results.

25. Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

Leadership and Teamwork

26. A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.

27. The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.

28. Leadership is not about being in charge. Leadership is about taking care of those in your charge.

29. A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.

30. The supreme quality of leadership is integrity.

Communication in Teams

31. The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.

32. To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.

33. Communication – the human connection – is the key to personal and career success.

34. The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn’t said.

35. Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know.

Diversity and Inclusion in Teams

36. Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.

37. Strength lies in differences, not in similarities.

38. Diversity is about all of us, and about us having to figure out how to walk through this world together.

39. Diversity is the one true thing we all have in common. Celebrate it every day.

40. We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.

Innovation Through Teamwork

41. Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

42. The best way to have a good idea is to have lots of ideas.

43. Creativity is thinking up new things. Innovation is doing new things.

44. Innovation is taking two things that already exist and putting them together in a new way.

45. The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.

Motivation and Team Spirit

46. Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.

47. The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

48. People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.

49. Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

50. Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

Conflict Resolution in Teams

51. In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

52. Conflict is inevitable, but combat is optional.

53. Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.

54. The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.

55. Whenever you’re in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.

Celebrating Team Achievements

56. Success is best when it’s shared.

57. The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.

58. Celebrate what you’ve accomplished, but raise the bar a little higher each time you succeed.

59. There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

60. Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Building Team Culture

61. Culture is simply a shared way of doing something with a passion.

62. Corporate culture is the only sustainable competitive advantage that is completely within the control of the entrepreneur.

63. Customers will never love a company until the employees love it first.

64. The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.

65. Culture eats strategy for breakfast.

Continuous Learning in Teams

66. The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.

67. Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.

68. Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

69. Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

70. The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you.

Conclusion

These teamwork quotes highlight the importance of collaboration, trust, and shared goals in achieving success. By embracing these principles, teams can overcome challenges, innovate, and reach new heights together. Remember, great achievements are rarely the work of individuals alone – they result from dedicated teams working in harmony toward a common purpose.

8 Youngest Olympic Gold Medalists In History

8 Youngest Olympic Gold Medalists In History

The Olympics have seen some extraordinary young athletes making history with their remarkable achievements. Among these, a select few have won gold at an incredibly young age, setting records that still stand. Here we listed 8 of them

Swipe Up to Learn More!

#8 Arisa Trew (Australia)14 years, 86 days (2024)

14-year-old Arisa Trew made history by winning a gold medal in skateboarding at Paris Olympic 2024. She is also the youngest Australian woman to do so, at just 14 years, two months, and 26 days old. This marks the first time an Australian woman has won gold in skateboarding.

#7 Krisztina Egerszegi (Hungary)14 years, 41 days (1988)

Hungarian swimmer Krisztina Egerszegi won her first gold in the 200-meter backstroke at the 1988 Seoul Olympics. She went on to win five gold medals in total.

#6 Kyoko Iwasaki (Japan)14 years, 6 days (1992)

Japanese swimmer Kyoko Iwasaki won gold in the 200-meter breaststroke at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics, becoming the youngest swimmer to win gold.

#5 Fu Mingxia (China)13 years, 345 days (1992)

Chinese diver Fu Mingxia won her first gold in the 10-meter platform event at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics. She earned a total of four gold medals in her career.

#4 Momiji Nishiya (Japan)13 years, 330 days (2020)

Japanese skateboarder Momiji Nishiya won gold in women’s street skateboarding at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, becoming Japan’s youngest gold medalist.

#3 Klaus Zerta (Germany)13 years, 283 days (1960)

German coxswain Klaus Zerta (middle in the photo) won gold in rowing at the 1960 Rome Olympics. He is the youngest male gold medalist.

#2 Marjorie Gestring (USA)13 years, 267 days (1936)

American diver Marjorie Gestring won gold in springboard diving at the 1936 Berlin Olympics, becoming the youngest U.S. gold medalist.

#1 Kim Yun-Mi (South Korea)13 years, 86 days (1994)

South Korean speed skater Kim Yun-Mi won gold in the women’s 3,000-meter relay at the 1994 Lillehammer Winter Olympics, making her the youngest Olympic gold medalist in history.

Memories Quotes: 30 Heartfelt Phrases to Reminisce on Your Old Moments

Reading memories quotes can help us reflect on our old moments.

Memories Quotes: 30 Heartfelt Phrases to Reminisce on Your Old Moments

Memories are something that remains in memory.

They are a link between the past and the present. Reading memories quotes can help us reflect on our old moments.

The following memories quotes are full of emotions, experiences, and wisdom from life's journey.

Each quote can stimulate the views, sounds, and sensations of the past and invite us to relive forgotten moments.

This article presents 30 of the best memories quotes that will take you through the corridors of memory.

Every word becomes a ship for return and reflection.

Best Memories Quotes 

  • “Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart.” ― Haruki Murakami

  • “No matter how much suffering you went through, you never wanted to let go of those memories.” ― Haruki murakami

  • “The past beats inside me like a second heart.” ― John Banville

  • “The town was paper, but the memories were not.” ― John Green

  • “Humans, not places, make memories.” ― Ama Ata Aidoo

  • “There are memories that time does not erase... Forever does not make loss forgettable, only bearable.” ― Cassandra Clare

  • “There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.” ― Shannon L. Alder

  • “The worst part of holding the memories is not the pain. It's the loneliness of it. Memories need to be shared.” ― Lois Lowry

  • “Nothing is ever really lost to us as long as we remember it.” ― L.M. Montgomery

  • “There are moments when I wish I could roll back the clock and take all the sadness away, but I have the feeling that if I did, the joy would be gone as well.” ― Nicholas Sparks

Memories Quotes on Life

  • "Life is short, but the memories we create endure forever." - Unknown

  • "Life is like a camera. Focus on the good times, develop from the negatives, and if things don't work out, take another shot." - Unknown

  • “Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.” – Dr. Seuss

  • “Life is a journey and memories are souvenirs we take along the way.” – Unknown
  • “Life is a collection of moments; some remembered, some forgotten, some treasured forever.” – Unknown

  • “We don’t remember days; we remember moments.” – Cesare Pavese

  • “Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take but by the moments that take our breath away.” – Maya Angelou

  • "Life is a collection of moments. Some we cherish, some we forget, but all are woven into the fabric of our existence." - Unknown

  • "Memories are the architecture of our identity, shaping who we are and reminding us of where we've been." - Unknown
  • “Some memories are realities and are better than anything that can ever happen to one again.” – Willa C

Memories Quotes on Love

  • “Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.” – Alysha Speer

  • “My fondest memories are the moments when I’m surrounded by family and friends that make me laugh and feel loved.” – Unknown

  • “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.” – A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh

“Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.” – From an Irish Headstone

  • "When we love, we leave fragments of our souls scattered across the landscape of memory. Each moment shared becomes a precious jewel, a treasure trove of emotions and experiences that we carry with us throughout our lives. Love is the bridge that connects us to our past, present, and future selves, reminding us of who we are and who we aspire to be." – Unknown

  • “The most beautiful things in life cannot be seen or touched. They must be felt with the heart.” – Helen Keller

  • “Memory is a way of holding onto the things you love, the things you are, the things you never want to lose.” – Kevin Arnold

  • “The best way to make happy memories is to create them with the people you love.” – Unknown
  • "Love is not measured by the moments we share, but by the memories we create. It's the laughter that echoes through the halls of time, the tears that water the garden of our hearts, and the whispers of devotion that linger in the spaces between breaths. Love is the story we write with every embrace, the melody we compose with every kiss, and the masterpiece we paint with every heartbeat." – Unknown

Author

Rizki Amelia Putri (intern)

75 Father's Day Messages from Wife: Sweet, Romantic and Funny

Father's Day gives wives a special chance to celebrate the amazing fathers in their lives. Finding the right Father's Day messages from wife can feel challenging when you want to express deep feelings. Many women struggle to put their thoughts into words for such an important day.

Your husband shows love and dedication through his role as a father every single day. He deserves to hear how much you appreciate his parenting efforts and the care he gives your children. The perfect message can make him feel valued and loved in ways he may not expect.

If you are looking for a sweet message to send to him on this very special day, you have come to the right place. In this article, we have gathered some sweet Father's Day messages from wife from various sources, Thursday (5/6/2025). These wishes will help you express your love and gratitude in ways your husband will always remember.

Sweet Father's Day Messages from Wife

1. You make our family complete with your gentle heart and loving spirit. Happy Father's Day to the most wonderful dad and husband.

2. Watching you become a father has been the greatest joy of my life. You are everything I dreamed of in a partner and parent.

3. Our children are so lucky to have you as their daddy. Your patience and kindness inspire me every single day.

4. Thank you for being the rock our family stands on. Your love gives us strength and comfort in every moment.

5. You turn ordinary days into magical memories for our kids. Happy Father's Day to my amazing husband and best friend.

6. Your hugs can fix any problem and your smile lights up our home. We are blessed to have you in our lives.

7. The way you read bedtime stories and tuck our children in shows your beautiful heart. You are an incredible father.

8. You teach our kids important lessons through your actions and words. Thank you for being such a positive role model.

9. Every day I fall more in love with the father you have become. Our family is perfect because of you.

10. Your dedication to our children never goes unnoticed. You are the heart and soul of our happy home.

11. You make parenting look easy with your natural love and care. Happy Father's Day to my wonderful partner in life.

12. Our children's laughter fills the house because of your playful spirit. You bring so much joy to our family.

13. Thank you for always putting our family first and loving us unconditionally. You are truly one of a kind.

14. Your gentle guidance helps our children grow into amazing people. I admire the father you are every single day.

15. You create the most beautiful memories with our kids. Happy Father's Day to the love of my life.

16. Your strong arms hold our family together through every challenge. We are safe and loved because of you.

17. The sparkle in our children's eyes when they see you makes my heart full. You are their hero and mine too.

18. You balance work and family life with such grace and love. Thank you for being an incredible husband and father.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: Peggy Is Britain's Ugliest Dog Who Became Dogpool in Deadpool & Wolverine
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: Dogpool's presence in the movie is also a topic of discussion.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
Peggy Is Britain's Ugliest Dog Who Became Dogpool in Deadpool & Wolverine

Peggy Is Britain's Ugliest Dog Who Became Dogpool in Deadpool & Wolverine

The movie Deadpool and Wolverine has hit theaters. Dogpool's presence in the movie is also a topic of discussion.

In Deadpool and Wolverine, Dogpool is introduced as a variant of Deadpool. The animal shows his connection to Deadpool's family. Ryan Reynolds, who plays Deadpool, talked about Dogpool in an interview.

He said Dogpool's real name is Peggy. She earned the title of Britain's Ugliest Dog. Unlike dogs, Peggy has a characteristic long tongue sticking out to the side.

What is Peggy's story that earned her the title of the ugliest dog in the UK?

As quoted from The Scotsman, Peggy's life was simple. She lived with her mother's family for six months, but the family eventually found her a new home.

Luckily, Peggy met Holly Middleton from East Yorkshire, who came to see the unwanted puppy. Holly fell in love at first sight.

"We fell in love with him the first time we saw him with his big brown eyes, a pinch of white hair, and his tongue sticking out to one side. I felt sorry for her, sitting there with no hair and her tongue sticking out. He was six months old, so I felt no one would want him. We didn't intend to get a quirky, underdog. I hope this encourages people to overlook the little quirks of abandoned dogs," says Holly.

Peggy's fate changed after winning the title of Britain's Ugliest Dog. Holly submitted Peggy to the UK's ugliest dog competition after several friends and family members told her Peggy might have a good chance.

Although the competition was tough, the judges had no doubt that Peggy deserved to win the title for managing to be ugly but cute at the same time. ParrotPrint founder Matt Dahan said that they never imagined finding stars when they launched the fun contest in late 2022.

"We were inundated with entries but most were too cute to be serious contenders in the ugly dog competition. Peggy was an exception. She was an early entrant, submitted by her owner Holly, and from the start, she stood out as the dog everyone was talking about," he said.

The UK's Ugliest Dog Award apparently led Peggy's way to Hollywood. Peggy's trainer, Jules Tottman, says Disney discovered the dog through internet research after winning the contest due to her unique appearance.

Tottman also shared her first impression of meeting the Dogpool cast member. When Tottman first met Peggy, the dog seemed wary of people, but she says that soon changed.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: How to Season Cast Iron Skillet Correctly
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: Learn how to season cast iron skillet correctly, how to clean it, and tips to keep it in good shape for a longer time.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_keywords: how to season cast iron skillet,cast iron skillet,seasoning cast iron skillet
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
How to Season Cast Iron Skillet Correctly

Are you wondering how to season cast iron skillet properly? Cast iron skillets are one of the most popular cooking tools in kitchens around the world. These heavy, dark pans are made from iron metal and can last for many years when cared for correctly.

Cast iron skillets need a special treatment called seasoning to work well. Seasoning is a thin layer of oil that becomes hard when heated. This layer protects the iron from rust and makes the pan non-stick. Without proper seasoning, food will stick to the pan and the iron may start to rust.

In this article, we will talk about how to season cast iron skillet, how to clean it, and tips to keep it in good shape. We gathered these guides from various sources, Monday (23/6/2025).

How to Season Cast Iron Skillet

Follow these simple steps to season your cast iron skillet correctly:

Step 1: Clean the Pan

Start by washing your cast iron skillet with warm water and mild soap. Use a soft sponge to remove any dirt or factory coating. Dry the pan completely with a clean towel. Place the pan on your stove for 1-2 minutes to remove any remaining water.

Step 2: Choose Your Oil

Select a cooking oil for seasoning. Good options include vegetable oil, canola oil, or corn oil. These oils work well because they heat evenly and create a strong coating. Pour a small amount of oil into the pan - about one teaspoon is enough for most skillets.

Step 3: Apply the Oil

Use a paper towel or clean cloth to spread the oil all over the pan. Cover the inside, outside, and handle completely. After spreading the oil, wipe away any excess oil until the pan looks almost dry. Too much oil can make the surface sticky.

Step 4: Heat in the Oven

Preheat your oven to 450°F (230°C). Place the oiled pan upside down on the middle oven rack. Put a baking sheet on the bottom rack to catch any oil drips. Heat the pan for 30 minutes.

Step 5: Repeat the Process

Take the hot pan out carefully using oven gloves. Apply another thin layer of oil and wipe away excess. Return the pan to the oven for another 30 minutes. Repeat this oil and heating process 3-4 times total.

Step 6: Cool Down

Turn off the oven and let the pan cool completely inside. Do not open the oven door during cooling. Once cool, your cast iron skillet is ready to use.

Should You Re-Season Cast Iron Skillet?

Yes, you should re-season your cast iron skillet when needed. Signs that your pan needs new seasoning include food sticking more than usual, gray spots appearing on the surface, or rust forming. Well-used pans may need re-seasoning every few months during the first year. However, regular cooking with oil naturally builds up seasoning over time, so heavy re-seasoning becomes less necessary as your pan ages and develops a strong coating.

How to Clean Cast Iron Skillet

Cleaning your cast iron skillet the right way helps protect the seasoning layer you worked hard to build. Good cleaning habits will keep your pan in excellent condition for many years. Follow these steps after each use:

Step 1: Clean While Warm

Clean your cast iron skillet while it is still warm but not hot. Scrape off any food pieces with a plastic scraper or wooden spoon. For stuck food, add warm water and let it sit for a few minutes.

Step 2: Wash Gently

You can use mild soap and warm water to wash your pan. This is safe for seasoned cast iron despite old beliefs. Use a soft sponge or brush to clean the surface. Avoid steel wool or harsh scrubbers that can damage the seasoning.

Step 3: Dry Completely

Rinse the pan with clean water and dry it right away with a towel. Place the pan on the stove over low heat for 1-2 minutes to make sure all water evaporates. Moisture can cause rust on cast iron.

Step 4: Apply Thin Oil Layer

While the pan is still warm, add a tiny amount of cooking oil. Wipe it around with a paper towel until the pan looks almost dry. This thin oil layer protects the pan and maintains the seasoning between uses.

Tips to Use Cast Iron Skillet

Here are important tips to get the best results from your cast iron cookware:

- Preheat Before Cooking: Always heat your cast iron skillet slowly before adding food. Start with low heat for 3-5 minutes, then increase to your desired cooking temperature. This prevents food from sticking and ensures even cooking.

- Avoid Acidic Foods at First: Do not cook tomatoes, vinegar, or lemon juice in new cast iron pans. These acidic foods can damage fresh seasoning and create metallic tastes. Wait until your pan has strong seasoning before cooking acidic ingredients.

- Use Enough Fat: Add oil, butter, or other cooking fats when cooking. Cast iron needs fat to prevent sticking, especially with eggs or delicate foods. The fat also helps build up the seasoning layer.

- Cook Fatty Foods First: When your pan is new, cook bacon, steaks, or other fatty foods often. The fat from these foods helps strengthen the seasoning quickly. Avoid cooking eggs or pancakes until your seasoning is well-developed.

- Store in Dry Place: Keep your cast iron skillet in a dry cabinet or on the stove. Never store it while damp, as this causes rust. Some people place paper towels between stacked pans to prevent scratching.

- Handle Temperature Changes Carefully: Never put a hot cast iron pan into cold water. This sudden temperature change can crack the pan. Let it cool down first, then wash with warm water.

- Use Metal Utensils Safely: You can use metal spatulas with cast iron, unlike non-stick pans. However, be gentle to avoid scraping away seasoning. Wooden or plastic utensils are also good choices.

- Never Store Food in the Pan: Remove all food from your cast iron skillet after cooking. Storing food in the pan can damage the seasoning and create metallic flavors. Transfer leftovers to proper storage containers.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: Top 10 Anime of the 2010s You Need to Watch
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: Here are the ten best and most iconic anime of the 2010s you need to add to your watchlist.

Top 10 Anime of the 2010s You Need to Watch

The 2010s were an important time for anime. Many new and impressive shows were released during this decade. These anime gained fans not only in Japan but also across the world. People of all ages started watching anime more than ever before.

A lot of anime from this time stand out because of their strong stories and great animation. These shows cover many themes like action, adventure, sports, and even cooking. Some became well-known thanks to their unique characters, while others were praised for exciting fights or emotional scenes.

If you're new to anime or want something good to watch, this list is a great place to start. These anime are some of the most popular and talked-about from the 2010s. They're enjoyable, easy to follow, and worth your time. Let’s take a look at the top 10 anime you shouldn’t miss from this decade.

Attack on Titan

In a world ravaged by colossal humanoid creatures known as Titans, humanity is forced to live within massive walls for protection. Eren Yeager, along with his friends Mikasa and Armin, vows to exterminate the Titans after witnessing the destruction of his home and the death of his mother. The anime follows their journey as they uncover the mysteries surrounding the Titans and fight for the survival of mankind. It's a gripping tale of survival, friendship, and the complexities of war.

Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba

Tanjiro Kamado's life changes forever when his family is attacked by demons, and his sister Nezuko is transformed into one. Driven by revenge and a desire to cure Nezuko, Tanjiro joins the Demon Slayer Corps, a secret society dedicated to protecting humanity from demons. The anime is known for its stunning animation, intense fight sequences, and the emotional bond between Tanjiro and Nezuko. It's a story of perseverance, family, and the fight against overwhelming odds.

Steins;Gate

This mind-bending anime follows a group of eccentric scientists who accidentally invent a device capable of sending messages to the past. Their experiments have unintended consequences, leading them down a rabbit hole of alternate timelines and paradoxes. Steins;Gate is a complex and thrilling story that explores the themes of time travel, causality, and the weight of choices. The intricate plot and memorable characters make it a truly unforgettable experience.

Vinland Saga

Set in the early 11th century, Vinland Saga tells the brutal and violent tale of Thorfinn, a young warrior seeking revenge against Askeladd, the man who killed his father. The anime is a historical epic filled with stunning visuals, intense action, and complex characters. It explores themes of revenge, violence, and the search for peace in a world consumed by conflict. The journey of Thorfinn is one of self-discovery and the slow, arduous path to redemption.

Hunter x Hunter

Gon Freecss embarks on a journey to become a Hunter, a licensed professional who undertakes dangerous and often extraordinary missions. Along the way, he meets Killua Zoldyck, Kurapika Kurta, and Leorio Paradinight, and together they face numerous challenges and powerful opponents. Hunter x Hunter is known for its intricate plot, well-developed characters, and exciting Nen abilities. The anime is a captivating adventure filled with friendship, betrayal, and the pursuit of one's dreams.

Haikyu!!

This inspiring anime follows the journey of Shoyo Hinata, a small but determined volleyball player, and his team as they strive to reach the national championships. Haikyu!! is a heartwarming story about teamwork, perseverance, and the pursuit of excellence. The anime showcases the passion and dedication of the characters as they overcome obstacles and grow together as a team. It's a great watch for those who appreciate sports anime and stories about overcoming challenges.

My Hero Academia

In a world where almost everyone has superpowers, or “Quirks,” Izuku Midoriya is born without one. Despite this, he dreams of becoming the greatest hero. After a chance encounter with the legendary hero All Might, Midoriya inherits his Quirk and begins his training at UA High, a prestigious academy for heroes in training. My Hero Academia is a vibrant and action-packed anime that explores themes of heroism, friendship, and the importance of never giving up on your dreams.

Sword Art Online

A massive multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) called Sword Art Online traps its players within its virtual world. Kirito, along with thousands of other players, must overcome the game's challenges and defeat the final boss to escape. Sword Art Online is a popular isekai anime known for its immersive virtual world and action-packed battles. The story follows Kirito's adventures as he navigates the dangers of the virtual world and forms bonds with other players.

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

This long-running anime follows the adventures of the Joestar family, a lineage of individuals who have fought against various supernatural threats throughout generations. Each part of the series features a different Joestar protagonist and a unique storyline. JoJo's Bizarre Adventure is known for its over-the-top action, memorable characters, and distinctive art style. The anime is a wild ride filled with unique powers, stylish fights, and unforgettable characters.

Food Wars! - Shokugeki no Soma

Soma Yukihira, a young culinary prodigy, enrolls in Totsuki Culinary Academy, an elite school known for its intense cooking competitions. He must compete against other talented chefs to prove his skills and achieve his dream of becoming a renowned chef. Food Wars! is a fun and exciting anime that celebrates the art of cooking and the passion of its characters. The anime is known for its vibrant visuals and its depiction of the intense culinary battles.

5 Haunted Places In Southampton: Paranormal Spots You Should Be Aware

Southampton is a city known for its rich history and bustling atmosphere. It also has its fair share of spooky stories and haunted locations.

From ancient ruins to historic pubs, here are five paranormal spots in Southampton that you should know about.

Haunted Places In Southampton

1. Netley Abbey

This medieval monastery dates back to the 13th century. It is said to be haunted by the ghost of a monk who wanders the ruins at night.

The abbey is located in Netley, Southampton, and was once a place of worship and relaxation before it fell into disrepair. Visitors have reported hearing mysterious footsteps and whispers echoing through the ancient stone walls.

This 15th-century museum is a popular attraction for history buffs but also has a reputation for being haunted.

2. Tudor House Museum

The museum in Southampton's Old Town is said to be home to the ghost of a former resident who roams the halls at night. Visitors have reported seeing shadowy figures and feeling cold spots in various rooms throughout the museum.

3. The Talking Heads

This live music venue in Southampton is known not just for its performances but also for its paranormal activity. 

The building, which dates back to the 19th century, is said to be haunted by the spirits of former patrons and performers.

Visitors have reported hearing strange noises and feeling a sense of unease in some regions of the venue.

Haunted Places In Southampton

5. Old Post House, Southampton

This historic building is said to be haunted by the ghost of a former postmaster who died under mysterious circumstances. It is located near West Quay Shopping Centre. Visitors have reported hearing strange noises and flickering lights in the windows of the old post house. The building, with its eerie atmosphere and dark history. This site has become a hotspot for paranormal fans looking to experience something unusual.

With its long history and rich cultural heritage, Southampton has bustling streets and lively events.

This city is also a place where ghosts and spirits are said to roam. Whether you believe in the supernatural or are just a curious explorer, these haunted Southampton places will surely send chills down your spine. So, next time you're in town, visit these paranormal spots and see if you can solve the mysteries within their walls. Happy ghost hunting!

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
Top 5 Most Popular Jamaican Foods to Try in Your Lifetime

Jamaican cooking is a flavorful blend of African, European, and local influences. These have delighted taste buds around the world. It is known for its bold spices and rich flavors.

Top 5 Most Popular Jamaican Foods to Try in Your Lifetime

Jamaican foods reflect the island's rich cultural heritage and various culinary traditions. It ranges from spicy jerk chicken to exotic ackee and saltfish. The following five foods are must-try. Their delicacies will transport you to the sunny shores of Jamaica.

Let's check out some of the five most popular Jamaican foods compiled from numerous sources, Tuesday (08/08/2023).

Popular Jamaican Foods

Jamaican jerk chicken is the most iconic dish on the island. It is a true representation of its rich culinary culture. The history of jerk seasoning dates back centuries— the time when African slaves combined their traditional cooking methods with the local spices of Jamaica.

1. Jamaican Jerk Chicken

The result is a mouthwatering blend of fiery Scotch bonnet peppers, pimento (allspice), thyme, garlic, and other aromatic spices. Then it is rubbed into the chicken before grilling over an open flame.

pinterest_delish

The slow-cooking process allows the flavors to infuse deeply into the meat.

That also creates a juicy and smoky masterpiece. Jerk chicken is often served with rice and peas. They also add a festival (a sweet fried dumpling) and a refreshing side of tropical fruit salsa.

Ackee and saltfish are Jamaica's national dishes. It is a breakfast favorite that delights locals and tourists alike. Ackee is a bright red fruit. It was brought to the Caribbean from West Africa during the colonial era.

2. Ackee and Saltfish

When cooked, it has a texture similar to scrambled eggs. It is simmered with salted codfish, onions, tomatoes, Scotch bonnet peppers, and seasonings. The dish offers a delightful balance of flavors.
Photo: pinterest_roxychowdown

Ackee and saltfish combine the salted fish's richness with the unique ackee taste.

It is often served with fried dumplings or boiled green bananas for a satisfying start to the day.

Jamaican curry goat is a tantalizing dish. It showcases the Indian influence on Jamaican cooking. Jamaican curry goat was introduced to the island by Indian immigrants. This flavorful curry dish features tender pieces of goat meat marinated in a fragrant blend of curry spices.

3. Jamaican Curry Goat

The seasoning includes turmeric, coriander, cumin, and fenugreek. The meat is slow-cooked to perfection. So it results in tender morsels that melt in your mouth. Served with rice and peas or roti (Indian flatbread), Jamaican curry goat is a comforting and hearty meal. It represents a harmonious blend of cultural influences.
pinterest_recipes.sparkpeople

Pepper pot soup is a cherished Jamaican treat. It reflects the island's Amerindian heritage. It is a hearty and spicy soup made with a variety of meats. The meats include beef, pork, and chicken.

4. Pepper Pot Soup

They are cooked with callaloo (a leafy green vegetable), okra, yams, and a medley of aromatic spices.

Traditionally, pepper pot soup is steamed in large pots for an elongated period, allowing the flavors to meld together and creating a rich, savory broth. The dish is trendy at joyful events and family gatherings.

Breadfruit is originally from the Pacific Islands. It was got to Jamaica by Captain Bligh in the 18th century as a cheap and excellent food source for slaves. Today, fried breadfruit is a beloved side dish or snack. It has become a staple in Jamaican cuisine.

5. Fried Breadfruit

The starchy fruit is boiled until tender. Then fried until golden and crispy. It can be enjoyed as a tasty treat on its own or paired with jerk meats, saltfish, or other Jamaican foods. The texture of fried breadfruit is similar to a potato, making it an adaptable and delightful addition to any meal.
pinterest_wetrinifood

Most Popular Jamaican Food

Jamaican cuisine is a celebration of the island's history. They blend influences from Africa, Europe, and Asia to create tantalizing flavors and textures. Each dish offers a taste of Jamaica's rich culinary heritage. Exploring these famous Jamaican foods is a culinary journey. It is also a chance to engage yourself in the island's rich culture and experience the warmth and hospitality of its people. So, let your taste buds take on a delicious adventure. Be prepared to fall in love with the delightful flavors of Jamaica.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: Education Level Survey Questions: A Comprehensive Guide for Researchers
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: This guide will explain how to ask good questions about education level in surveys.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
Education Level Survey Questions: A Comprehensive Guide for Researchers

Education level is an important piece of information to collect in many surveys. Knowing a person’s educational background can help researchers understand differences between groups and make better decisions. This guide will explain how to ask good questions about education level in surveys.

Importance of Education Level Questions

Asking about education level in surveys is helpful for many reasons:

• It shows how education might affect other survey answers

• It helps group people with similar backgrounds

• It gives information about the knowledge and skills of those surveyed

• It can show if certain groups have less access to education

• It helps create a full picture of who took the survey

For example, a company making a new tech product might want to know if people with more education are more likely to buy it. Or a government agency might use education data to see if all groups have equal access to jobs.

Example Education Level Survey Questions

Here are some good ways to ask about education level in a survey:

Basic question:

What is the highest level of education you have completed?

• Less than high school

• High school diploma or GED

• Some college, no degree

• Associate’s degree (2-year)

• Bachelor’s degree (4-year)

• Master’s degree

• Doctoral or professional degree (PhD, MD, JD, etc.)

More detailed question:

What is the highest degree or level of school you have completed? If currently enrolled, mark the previous grade or highest degree received.

• No schooling completed

• Nursery school to 8th grade

• Some high school, no diploma

• High school graduate, diploma or GED

• Some college credit, no degree

• Trade/technical/vocational training

• Associate degree

• Bachelor’s degree

• Master’s degree

• Professional degree

• Doctorate degree

Question about current students:

Are you currently a student?

• Yes, full-time student

• Yes, part-time student

• No, not currently a student

Follow-up for current students:

What type of school or program are you currently enrolled in?

• High school

• Trade/technical/vocational program

• 2-year college (Associate’s degree)

• 4-year college (Bachelor’s degree)

• Graduate program (Master’s, PhD, etc.)

• Professional program (MD, JD, etc.)

Best Practices for Asking About Education

Follow these tips to ask good education questions:

• Use clear language: Avoid confusing terms. Use words most people know.

• Give enough options: Include choices for all education levels.

• Allow for differences: Remember education systems vary in different countries.

• Ask about current students: Find out if people are still in school.

• Don’t assume: Avoid guessing someone’s education based on age or job.

• Respect privacy: Let people skip the question if they want.

• Test your questions: Try them out to make sure they work well.

Other Important Demographic Questions

Education level is just one type of demographic question. Here are other important ones to consider:

• Age: How old are you?

• Gender: What is your gender?

• Race/Ethnicity: What is your race or ethnic background?

• Income: What is your yearly household income?

• Employment: What is your job status?

• Location: Where do you live? (City, state, country)

• Marital Status: Are you married, single, divorced, etc.?

• Children: Do you have children? How many?

These questions help create a full picture of who took your survey. But only ask what you really need to know.

Where to Place Education Questions in a Survey

Where you put education questions in your survey matters. Here are some tips:

• At the end: Many surveys put demographic questions like education at the end. This way, people answer the main survey questions first.

• At the start: Sometimes you need to know education level right away to decide if someone should take the survey. In this case, ask early.

• Middle: If education is very important to your survey topic, you might ask in the middle.

• Grouped with other demographics: Often, all demographic questions are put together in one section.

The best place depends on your survey goals. Think about what works best for your needs.

Analyzing Education Level Data

Once you have education data, here’s how to use it:

• Group responses: Look at how people with different education levels answered other questions.

• Find patterns: See if education level relates to other things, like income or opinions.

• Compare groups: Check if people with more or less education think differently.

• Look for gaps: See if some education levels are missing or underrepresented.

• Consider other factors: Remember that education is just one part of a person’s background.

Use charts and graphs to show how education relates to other survey answers. This can help you see important trends.

Challenges and Considerations

Asking about education can be tricky. Here are some things to think about:

• Different systems: Education levels and names vary between countries.

• Sensitive topic: Some people might not want to share their education level.

• Ongoing education: It can be hard to classify people still in school.

• Informal learning: Not all valuable knowledge comes from formal education.

• Changing standards: What counts as “high” education changes over time.

• Bias: Be careful not to judge people based on education level.

Keep these issues in mind when asking about and using education data.

Education Questions for Global Surveys

If your survey includes people from different countries, you need to think about how education systems vary. Here are some tips:

• Use general terms: Instead of specific degree names, use broader categories like “secondary education” or “university degree.”

• Provide examples: Give examples of what each level means in different places.

• Allow for write-ins: Let people explain their education if it doesn’t fit the options.

• Consider years of schooling: Sometimes asking total years of formal education is easier to compare across countries.

• Research local systems: If focusing on specific countries, learn about their education structures.

Remember, the goal is to get comparable information across different education systems.

Trends in Education Level Data Collection

How we ask about and use education data is changing. Here are some new trends:

• Skills-based questions: Some surveys now ask about specific skills, not just degrees.

• Lifelong learning: There’s more focus on ongoing education and training, not just formal schooling.

• Online education: Surveys are starting to include questions about online courses and degrees.

• Multiple pathways: Recognition that people can gain knowledge in many ways, not just traditional school.

• Data privacy: Growing concern about protecting personal information, including education data.

Stay updated on these trends to keep your education questions relevant and useful.

Conclusion

Asking about education level in surveys is important for understanding differences between groups and making informed decisions. By using clear questions, considering cultural differences, and following best practices, you can collect valuable education data. Remember to use this information responsibly and in context with other demographic factors. As education systems and learning methods continue to change, stay flexible in how you ask about and interpret education levels in your research.

5 Haunted Castles In Wales That Bear Witness to the Supernatural

5 Haunted Castles In Wales That Bear Witness to the Supernatural

Wales is a land of magic and ancient legends.

It is home to some of the most awe-inspiring castles in the world. These majestic structures have stood the test of time, keeping tales of long-forgotten battles and royal splendor. However, creeping within their walls are stories of a different kind – stories of ghostly apparitions and haunted halls. Today, we explore five haunted castles in Wales that bear witness to the supernatural.

Haunted Castles In Wales

1. Whittington Castle

First on our list is Whittington Castle, located in Shropshire near the Welsh border. Legend says that a beautiful lady in white wandered the castle grounds at night.

She was waiting for her long-lost lover to return from battle. Visitors have reported hearing her soft cries. Some also see her ghostly figure walking the grounds. It is believed that her spirit still lingers, unable to find peace.

2. Margam Castle, Port Talbot

Next, we travel to Margam Castle in Port Talbot. This magnificent Gothic mansion is said to be haunted by ex-residents' spirits.

Visitors have reported hearing footsteps echoing through empty corridors and seeing objects moving alone.

The most famous ghostly resident is that of a young girl named Emily. She tragically died in the castle. Her spirit is said to roam the halls still, playing tricks on guests.

Haunted Castles In Wales

Moving on to Pembrokeshire, we come across Roch Castle. This medieval fortress is known for its creepy atmosphere and ghostly sightings.

3. Roch Castle, Pembrokeshire

The most famous ghostly resident is that of a lady in white, believed to be the wife of a former Lord of the castle. She is said to walk the halls, searching for her lost love. Visitors have reported feeling an icy presence. Some also hear mysterious footsteps in the dead of night.

In Cardiff, our next haunted castle awaits – Cardiff Castle. This iconic landmark is a popular tourist attraction and home to several ghostly encounters.

4. Cardiff Castle, Cardiff

The Red Lady is believed to be the spirit of an ex-resident and is said to haunt the castle. She is often seen walking the corridors in her red gown, with an aura of sadness. Visitors have reported feeling a chill. Some also heard whispers in empty rooms, believed to be the presence of the Red Lady.

5. Castell Coch, Cardiff


Last but not least, we visited Castell Coch, also located in Cardiff. This fairy-tale-like castle holds its fair share of ghostly tales. One of the most famous stories is that of a phantom horseman, said to gallop through the castle grounds at midnight.

Haunted Castles In Wales

Visitors have reported hearing the sound of hooves pounding and seeing a shadowy figure on horseback. It is believed to be the spirit of a former nobleman who met a tragic end.

These haunted castles in Wales are not just historic landmarks but a world beyond.

They serve as a reminder that even in the most majestic of places, the supernatural can still make its sight known. So, the next time you visit Wales, explore these castles and see if you can bear witness to the supernatural.

Taylor Swift Criticized for Contributing 138 Tons of Carbon Emissions in Just 3 Months

Taylor Swift Criticized for Contributing 138 Tons of Carbon Emissions in Just 3 Months

Taylor Swift has again topped the list of 'biggest CO2 polluting celebrities' for 2023.

As quoted by The Economic Times, the 34-year-old musician's frequent travel, especially to spend time with her boyfriend Travis Kelce, has resulted in 138 tons of carbon emissions (referring to the release or discharge of carbon dioxide (CO2) gases into the atmosphere as a result of human or natural activity) in just the past three months.

Swift's highly publicized romance has seen her traverse the skies between New York and Kansas City, United States, and various South American destinations for her ongoing Eras Tour.

According to statistics tracked by Taylor Swift's Jets on Instagram, her 12 trips created an environmental impact equivalent to the energy consumption of 17 homes in a year or the electricity use of 26.9 homes in the same period.

The singer, who owns two multi-million dollar aircraft, a Dassault Falcon 7x and a Dassault Falcon 900, has been criticized for her significant carbon footprint.

According to the Greenhouse Gas Equivalencies Calculator, 138 tons of CO2 emissions would require planting 2,282 trees and letting them grow for a decade to offset the environmental damage caused by her flights.

In response to the allegations, a spokesperson for Swift stated that the star has purchased more than double the carbon credits needed to offset all tour travel before the Eras Tour kicks off in March 2023.

The excess credits are expected to cover additional flights taken for Swift to support her boyfriend and tour itinerary.

TXT Soobin's Comments About HYBE's Internal Document Scandal

HYBE's internal documents are becoming controversial, especially among K-pop fans. The collection of HYBE's documents contains various criticisms and comments on idols from various other agencies.

Under HYBE, TXT's Soobin, who will make a comeback, has also spoken out regarding the internal document scandal.

Context of the Comments

In a press conference, Soobin said that TXT felt the pressure in this matter as they prepared for their comeback and ongoing tour.

The idol also stated that TXT has been focused on working hard for their new album.

“We have been on tour for more than half a year starting in May and meanwhile have been very busy preparing for the new album,” TXT's Soobin explained, as reported by StarNews on Sunday, November 3, 2024.

Not Affected by HYBE's Current Condition

The group will continue to focus on their work.

“To be honest, we are still focused on the new album and concert preparations regardless of the situation around us,” Soobin said.

TXT Gives Their Best Despite the HYBE Controversy

Soobin also said that TXT is fully committed to performing their best in front of fans, regardless of the surrounding conditions.

“As always, we will do many activities to show you what we have prepared and what we can do well. Without hesitation and regret, so please look forward to it,” said the TXT's leader.

Reaction to Soobin's Statements

Many fans expressed their disappointment over Soobin's statement. They felt that he may have underestimated the seriousness of the situation or misrepresented fans' concerns regarding HYBE's practices.

Oppenheimer Has Topped the Worldwide Box Office in Its 6th Week of Release

Oppenheimer Has Topped the Worldwide Box Office in Its 6th Week of Release

Oppenheimer has topped the worldwide box office in its sixth week of release, surpassing Barbie for the first time.

Since both films were released on July 21, Greta Gerwig’s fantasy comedy has remained ahead of Oppenheimer at the global box office.

On the weekend of August 25-27, however, Christopher Nolan’s historical drama topped the chart.

trstdly.com

As reported by ScreenDaily, Oppenheimer took $38.1million globally within the weekend timeframe, while Barbie trailed behind with $35.3million.

The boost results from Oppenheimer’s belated release in two new countries: Italy, where it grossed $ 9.7 million over its five-day debut, and Greece, where it racked up $882,000.

The film looks set to receive a significant boost this week, with Oppenheimer opening in China on Wednesday (August 30).

Despite trailing behind this week, Barbie is still on track to surpass The Super Mario Bros. Movie as the highest-grossing movie of 2023.

trstdly.com

The film passed the $ 1.342 billion mark at the global box office, officially besting Harry Potter And The Deathly Hallows – Part 2 as the highest-grossing movie in Warner Bros. history.

Barbie and Oppenheimer’s dual release created the “Barbenheimer” phenomenon, which boosted the success of both films at the box office.

"X" Is Officially Deletes The Circle Feature, Why?

Circles is a feature where X users can customize who can interact with their posts.

"X" Is Officially Deletes The Circle Feature, Why?

Circles is a feature where X users can customize who can interact with their posts.

This feature existed before Elon Musk took over and renamed Twitter to X.

However, the Circles feature has been officially removed from the Twitter/X application.

Why is that?

In a PSA, the X app officially removed the Circles feature starting today.

As reported by The Verge, the company said in a "PSA" on Thursday that Circles will be disabled on October 31.

This change makes the X user cannot modify certain people to interact to their posts.

“After this date, you will not be able to create new posts that are limited to your Circle, nor will you be able to add people to your Circle,” X wrote in a post on its help center.

“You will, however, be able to remove people from your Circle,” and the company gave instructions on how to do that.

This feature suffered from bugs and problems in April 2023.

In April 2023, a bug in Circles caused some users' private tweets to be shared publicly and led to criticism for the feature to be shut down.

In fact, X CEO Elon Musk has also expressed his dislike for Circles and said that Twitter should be a public platform where everyone can see what others are saying.

If users want to keep contacts that are still in Circles, X recommends unfollowing them.

Then, users can follow those profiles again to remove their Circles and add them as regular contacts.

8 Deadliest Warriors in History

8 Deadliest Warriors in History

Warriors have always been skilled fighters throughout history. Some types of warriors were especially deadly. Let's explore eight of them.

Swipe Up to Learn More!

Samurai

Japanese samurai were skilled warriors with sharp swords and a strict code of honor called Bushido. They were dangerous on the battlefield.

Viking Berserkers

Viking berserkers were fearless Norse warriors who fought with wild strength, wearing animal skins to scare their enemies.

Roman Legionnaires

Roman Legionnaires were well-trained soldiers who used advanced weapons and smart tactics in ancient times.

Mongol Horse Archers

Mongol horse archers, led by warriors like Genghis Khan, were skilled at mounted warfare with fast horses and powerful archery.

Aztec Eagle Warriors

Aztec Eagle Warriors were brave fighters in the Aztec Empire, using sharp weapons and wearing eagle-like costumes.

Shaolin Monks

The ancient Chinese Shaolin Monks were both spiritual and skilled in kung fu, a unique form of self-defense.

Spartan Hoplites

Spartan hoplites were disciplined fighters in ancient Greece, known for their bravery, shields, and spears.

Navy SEALs

Modern Navy SEALs are elite soldiers trained for special missions, including underwater demolition and covert operations.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: Ex-Laboum Yulhee and FT Island's Minhwan Divorce After 5 Years of Marriage
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: Min Hwan agrees to have custody of his three children.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
Ex-Laboum Yulhee and FT Island's Minhwan Divorce After 5 Years of Marriage

Min Hwan agrees to have custody of his three children.

Ex-Laboum Yulhee and FT Island's Minhwan Divorce After 5 Years of Marriage

On December 4th, Choi Min Hwan of F.T. Island and Yulhee, ex-LABOUM, revealed they had decided to divorce. They have marriage for five years and have three children.

Choi Min Hwan expressed,

"Hello, this is Min Hwan. It's been a while since I greeted you, and though the message is not light, I cautiously share this difficult decision with you. After much consideration, our couple has decided to end our marriage. We appreciate your support for our decision to start a family at a young age, and we apologize sincerely to everyone—our family, team members, and fans."

I will do my best as a father to prevent our children from experiencing emotional distress. We hope to bring you good news again. Thank you."

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by 민환 최 (@minhwan12)

On the same day, Yulhee also gave her a statement.

"Hello, this is Yulhee. Today, I have to share a somewhat heavy story with you. It's not a pleasant feeling, but I wanted to convey it directly to those who have supported and loved us. After a lot of time, effort, and conversation, our couple has decided to support each other on our individual paths. While the path as a married couple ends here, our roles as parents to our children continue. We are both doing our best to care for and communicate with our children." 

Yulhee also said that her children stay at Min Hwan's house.

"Currently, after much thought, we have decided that the children should stay in the familiar space they have known. Both of us are involved in parenting to minimize practical and psychological disruptions, and I, too, spend time with the children regularly to make sure the absence of a mother is not strongly felt."

she added.

We have made this challenging decision for our happiness, and we hope you can watch over us with warm eyes. Despite the sudden and bewildering news, we appreciate your warm support. It's getting very cold these days, so I hope you have a warm day. Thank you for reading this lengthy message."

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by 김율희 (@yul._.hee)

Choi Min Hwan and Yulhee married in 2018. They have a son and twin daughters.

Currently, Min Hwan agrees to have custody of his three children.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.title: John Wick Anime Series Confirmed by The Movie Director
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: John Wick movie director, Chad Stahelski has reveled a new detail for the anime series adaptation.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
John Wick Anime Series Confirmed by The Movie Director

John Wick movie director, Chad Stahelski has reveled a new detail for the anime series adaptation.

John Wick Anime Series Confirmed by Its Movie Director

The prequel anime series will talks about John Wick's past.

John Wick movie director, Chad Stahelski has reveled a new detail for the anime series adaptation.

The movie director hinted that the anime series will talks about John Wick's past life as a professional killer before decided to retire.

He said this during an interview with The Hollywood Reporter.

A ‘JOHN WICK’ prequel anime film is in the works.

The film follows the “impossible task” that John Wick had to complete in order to retire from being an assassin.

(Source: https://t.co/okOx4RgtxK) pic.twitter.com/DLtIzwDQzK

— DiscussingFilm (@DiscussingFilm) October 22, 2024

“We can be a little bit more crazy and nutty in the anime, and we can be a lot more explicit in our storytelling and world building on the TV show,” he said.

“So those are exciting to us without seeming repetitive, and that’s where we’re putting our energies right now.”

Chad Stahelski explains that an anime gives them more room to have fun in the John Wick universe.

“It’s meant to be fun."

"Some of the prequels and sequels that you see in other franchises, we’re not meant to be built that way. We just want to have fun."

This anime project was announced earlier this year, but many fans think the story will take the same set with the live action, but in different medium.

With this confirmation, we can have a picture that the movie will set as a prequel.

However, there is no confirmation whether Keanu Reeves will reprise his role as John Wick or not.

-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_description: From Italian food to Spanish food, here are some popular traditional European dishes that are vegan-friendly.
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.meta_keywords: Vegan Friendly European Dishes,European Food,Vegetarian Food,Vegan,Vegetarian
-- Batch 7\r\nSELECT * FROM scraped_arti.content:
5 Vegan-Friendly, Traditional European Dishes

European dishes are some of the best in the world. From the tasty Italian dishes to the flavorful Spanish cuisine, they can always make our taste buds dance with joy. (Photo by Nha Van on Unsplash)

5 Vegan-Friendly, Traditional European Dishes

Many people might think that traditional European foods are not vegan-friendly. After all, European foods are known for heavy use of various meat and dairy products, like milk and cheese.

That stereotype isn't really that precise. There are some delicious traditional European foods that vegans can still enjoy.

© 2023 trstdly.com

In this article, we will uncover some vegan-friendly, traditional European dishes, as collected from various sources, on Wednesday (30/8/2023).

(Photo by amirali mirhashemian on Unsplash)

1. Pizza Marinara

You might be surprised that the famous pizza marinara is vegan-friendly. The pizza dough doesn't contain any egg, while the topping is only made of tomato sauce, garlic, olive oil, and oregano. It makes pizza marinara is perfectly safe for vegans. (Photo by LHOON on Flickr/CC BY-SA 2.0)

2. Spaghetti Aglio e Olio

The spaghetti aglio e olio is another classic Italian dish that is safe for vegans. It's made by sauteing spaghetti with extra virgin olive oil and garlic and garnished with chopped parsley. (Photo by adrian vieriu on Pexels)

Sometimes, they add red pepper flakes for an extra boost of flavor. Since most dried pasta, such as spaghetti, is only made of flour and water, it's perfectly safe for you, vegans. (Photo by Sole D'Alessandro G. on Unsplash)

Ratatouille is a classic dish from Southern France. It's a stew made from various summer vegetables, such as eggplant, summer squash, potatoes, bell peppers, zucchini, and onions. This colorful dish will make your summer special. (Photo by Marjan Sadeghi on Unsplash)

3. Ratatouille

4. Bruschetta al Pomodoro

It seems that Italian food is perfect for vegans because it has many vegan-friendly dishes, and bruschetta al pomodoro is one of them. (Photo by Margarita Zueva on Unsplash)

Bruschetta al pomodoro is a classic appetizer from Italy. It consists of grilled bread that is rubbed with garlic. It's topped with tomato, olive oil, and salt. (Photo by Chris Tweten on Unsplash)

Gazpacho is a cold soup from Spain. It's made from blended tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, onions, and garlic. It's a refreshing and flavorful dish, usually served in the hot summer months.

5. Gazpacho
